TopicTitle: How to make a texture for an engine

Articles.Content: After messing with blender for a few hours I ended up with a ractangle with a cone stuffed in the bottom and I decided to make it into an engine. Only problem is that it has no textures. Anyone know how I could make one? Edit* I couldn't find a good tutorial so don't yell at me for not looking first.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ix6_j-PMtSE

The texturing forum is here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forumdisplay.php/14-Modelling-and-Texturing-Discussion

Textures pretty much work as you expect, you either import them into the unity editor or drop them into a texture folder inside the part folder. You don't need to do anything special for KSP.
